// Pivot 0, 0
int wheel[52] = {
	25, 50,
	32, 49,
	38, 47,
	42, 44,
	46, 40,
	49, 35,
	50, 29,
	50, 23,
	48, 17,
	46, 12,
	42, 7,
	37, 3,
	30, 1,
	24, 0,
	18, 1,
	13, 3,
	8, 6,
	4, 11,
	1, 17,
	0, 23,
	0, 29,
	2, 35,
	5, 40,
	9, 44,
	16, 49,
	23, 50
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float wheel[52] = {
	0.500000f, 1.000000f,
	0.640000f, 0.980000f,
	0.760000f, 0.940000f,
	0.840000f, 0.880000f,
	0.920000f, 0.800000f,
	0.980000f, 0.700000f,
	1.000000f, 0.580000f,
	1.000000f, 0.460000f,
	0.960000f, 0.340000f,
	0.920000f, 0.240000f,
	0.840000f, 0.140000f,
	0.740000f, 0.060000f,
	0.600000f, 0.020000f,
	0.480000f, 0.000000f,
	0.360000f, 0.020000f,
	0.260000f, 0.060000f,
	0.160000f, 0.120000f,
	0.080000f, 0.220000f,
